info.title: SDC Form Designer
info.description: This profile defines the expected capabilities of the ''SDC Form Designer'' role when conforming to the S&I Framework's [[index.html|Structured Data Capture FHIR implementation guide]].  This role is responsible for defining forms ([[Questionnaire]] resource instances) that include references to [[StructureDefinition]] resouces containing data elements that define the meaning of particular questions and can be used to aid in pre-populating and auto-populating forms.
